p: Brachycephalic Obstructive Airway Syndrome (BOAS) is characterised by various upper airway abnormalities that could potentially trigger remodelling of the right heart. The aim of this study was to evaluate echocardiographic characteristics in symptomatic (BOAS) and asymptomatic French Bulldogs (FB) and Pugs. Dogs were diagnosed as BOAS according to clinical signs and anatomical abnormalities.
